pages.text: The $(thing)spores$() I planted have grown, and I have completed my first harvest. It appears that I was right; this thing I have found is $(key)a plant and a fungus living in harmony$(). I believe I shall call it $(item)Sporebrush$().
The spores covering the deep blue leaves of this plant are still shining so brightly. They must be full to the brim with energy. I should $(item)bundle$() some leaves together for better storage.

pages.title: Campfire Cooking
pages.text: Perhaps $(key)burning these bundles on a open fire$() might do something...$(br)The sporebrush should burn quite slowly, but about $(key)a minute$() should be enough to notice a result.
